Name: Landmarks, Kingsbridge Armory Redevelopment, Bronx (N 250296 ZRX).
Title: Application number N 250296 ZRX (Kingsbridge Armory Redevelopment) submitted by NYC Economic Development Corporation and 8th Regiment Partners LLC, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, amending Article VII, Chapter 4 (Special Permits by the City Planning Commission) and Article XII, Chapter 3 (Special Mixed Use District) for the purpose of establishing a new Special Mixed Use District, Borough of the Bronx, Community District 7, Council District 14.
BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Land Use
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions
